Description: Time taken to reach the destination location
Feasibility of reaching the required points in the workspace
Feasibility of the force applied by the end-effector (based on the maximum torqure of the motor selected)
Feasibility of carrying a 1 kg payload at fully stretched condition (based on the maximum torqure of the motor selected)
Total power loss due to the current flow in the windings
Power loss due to friction torque experienced by the motor
